actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to limit capital gains treatment for individuals to $50,000 of capital gains and to repeal the alternative tax for individuals.

summary.text: Limits, under the Internal Revenue Code, the capital gains deduction for individuals to $50,000. Repeals the alternative tax for taxpayers other than corporations.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to limit capital gains treatment for individuals to $50,000 of capital gains and to repeal the alternative tax for individuals.
